content: The legislators know the safeguards against vote fraud, so they know he is lying. Think about that, congressmen and senators know he will lie about anything. On the other hand, they are predisposed to voter suppression if they think it will help them get re-elected. Thus, they gleefully accept his lie because it gives cover to their voter suppression. They can always say, “The president told us that . . . . . . . . “
